## CssFn type

Represents the type of the `css` function, used to transform a [Rule](./core.rule.md) into a flat style object.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type CssFn<HookName, CSSProperties> = (
  style: Rule<HookName, CSSProperties>,

  ...styles: (Rule<HookName, CSSProperties> | undefined)[]
) => CSSProperties;
```
**References:** [Rule](./core.rule.md)
